invite_code_text:
Hi, I'm streamer $1 from 17!
Become a 17 member now and complete the following tasks to get a free gift and help me reach my goal!
1. Enter the invitation code $2 on the day of registration
2. Complete phone verification and watch $3 days of streams within $4 days of the task
It's super easy! Come support me on 17 if you like me!
Download 17 here:
invite_rule_content_HK:
„ÄêEvent Terms„Äë

Event period: $1

During the event, you will earn $2 HKD for every new friend invited who downloads the app and complete the tasks. If they complete the tasks, they can get gifts as well!

Easy 3 Steps to Invitiation Rewards
Send invitation code
Remind them to complete the tasks
Upon completion you'll get your reward!

New Friend's Tasks
Complete phone verification
Watch $3 streams within $4 days of registration

„ÄêNotes„Äë
Only contracted streamers from Hong Kong can participate. Rewards will be given according to event rules. 
Actual rewards given will be calculated by 17 Media.
Rewards received will be subject to local taxes and counted as annual declarable and payable income.
New friends refer to new 17 users who use a new account, new phone number, and new device. 17 Media will determine whether the user is a new user.
The event is held by 17 Media and 17 Media reserves the right to change and modify the event.
invite_rule_content_TW:
„ÄêEvent Terms„Äë

Event period: $1

During the event, you will earn NTD $2 for every new friend invited who downloads the app and complete the tasks. If they complete the tasks, they can get gifts as well!

Easy 3 Steps to Invitation Rewards
Send invitation code
Remind them to complete the tasks
Upon completion you'll get your reward!

New Friend's Tasks
Complete phone verification
Watch $3 streams within $4 days of registration

„ÄêNotes„Äë
Only contracted streamers from Taiwan can participate. Rewards will be given according to event rules. 
Actual rewards given will be calculated by 17LIVE.
Rewards received will be subject to local taxes and counted as annual declarable and payable income.
New friends refer to new 17 users who use a new account, new phone number, and new device. 17LIVE will determine whether the user is a new user.
The event is held by 17LIVE and 17LIVE reserves the right to change and modify the event.

mlevel_level_full: Congrats on earning $1 coins, you're now V Level 10!
mlevel_level_full_bc: Congrats on earning $1 coins, you're now V Level 10!
mlevel_next_level_bc: You have $1 coins. Just $2 coins to level up!
mlevel_next_level_points: You have $1 coins. Just $2 coins to level up!
mlevel_rule_content_1: All users start from Lv 0. Earn V Level and privileges depending on how much you recharge your account.
mlevel_rule_content_2: Coins are recalculated at 00:00 on 1st of every month (GMT+8)
mlevel_rule_content_3: Leveling up: Your V Level will move up when the monthly top up amount reaches the designated threshold. The leveling up is valid until end of the following month.
mlevel_rule_content_4: Level maintenance: Your V Level will stay the same the following month if the monthly top up amount meets the level maintenance threshold but not the leveling up threshold. (Maintenance requirement is 60% of tier Baby Coins)
mlevel_rule_content_5: Leveling down: Your V Level will move down when the monthly top up amount does not reach the threshold. The leveling down is effective the following month.
mlevel_rule_content_6:
For example:
‚Äª If a user is V Level 1 and has topped up 123,200 Baby Coins for the month, the user will level up to Lv 2 immediately and the status will stay until end of the following month. 
‚Äª If the user is V Lv 2 and has topped up 52,800 Baby Coins for the month, the user will still be Lv 2 next month.
‚ÄªIf the user is V Lv 2 and has topped up 20,000 Baby Coins for the month, the user will become Lv 1 next month.

paypal_payout_fail_notif_msg_revenue:
Dear $1,
We have sent your revenue from $2 of $3 to your PayPal account $5 at $4; unfortunately, the payment has failed and was returned to 17LIVE subsequently. Please rest assured that this amount is recorded as your accrued revenue and we will proceed with this payment again on the next billing date which is before the 25th of the next month. Please make sure you have set up the account information correctly inside 17LIVE App before the end of this month. For further information, please contact us at support@17.media.
paypal_payout_fail_notif_msg_reward:
Dear $1,
We have sent your 17Q Reward from $2 of $3 to your Paypal account $5 at $4; unfortunately, the payment has failed and was returned to 17 Media subsequently. Please rest assured that this amount is recorded as your accrued 17Q Reward and we will proceed with this payment again on the next billing date which is before the 25th of the next month. Please make sure you have set up the account information correctly inside 17 App before the end of this month. For further information, please contact us at support@17.media.
paypal_payout_success_notif_msg_revenue:
Dear $1,
Your revenue from $2 with an amount of $3 has been paid to your PayPal account $5 at $4. Please log in to your PayPal account to see the transaction details. Please note that you may need to claim this payment within 30 days; payments that are not claimed after 30 days are automatically returned to the sender (i.e. 17 Media) with additional fees incurred by PayPal.
paypal_payout_success_notif_msg_reward:
Dear $1,
Your 17Q Reward from $2 with an amount of $3 has been paid to your PayPal account $5 at $4. Please log in to your PayPal account to see the transaction details. Please note that you may need to claim this payment within 30 days; payments that are not claimed after 30 days are automatically returned to the sender (i.e. 17 Media) with additional fees incurred by PayPal.

streamer_growth_info_dailytask_header: Streamers will get rewards when they complete tasks each day!
streamer_growth_info_dailytask_rules1: Complete 5 daily tasks to gain rewards and upgrade rising stars!
streamer_growth_info_dailytask_rules2: All tasks will be reset at 05:00(GMT+8 )
streamer_growth_info_dailytask_rules3: 17LIVE has the right to change the streaming tasks and awards.
streamer_growth_info_dailytask_rules_pok: Poke fans task: Each fan will only count one time. (Poke all is excluded)
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_header: Streamers will get rewards when they reach higher levels each month!
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics1: Monthly validated streaming hours - from the first day to the last day of each month, streaming sessions will be validated up to a maximum of 2 hours per day.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics2: Total coins received: coins received from the first day this month until yesterday.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics3: Number of increased new posts: number of the posts increased from the first day of this month until yesterday compare to last month
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics4: Monthly unique gift senders: number of gift senders counted from the first day of this month until yesterday
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics5: Maximum accumulated followers: followers gained from the first day this month until yesterday.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics6: Cumulative number of streaming reservation for this month: refers to the cumulative number of streaming reservations from the 1st day of this month until the last day of this month (GMT+8).
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_metrics7: New followers: new followers gained in the current month, and it will fluctuate if the followers unfollow.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rewardde: Badge of Rising Star: According to the different levels earned by rising star (please see the reward sheet), different badges will be given to represent the streamer's rising star status, which will be updated at the beginning of each month.
Stickers of Rising Star: Tier 1- Tier 2 will be entitled to one special sticker, and Tier 3 - Tier 5 will be entitled to another special sticker for 30 days after receiving it.

Achievement Score: According to the different levels earned by rising star (please see the reward sheet), the corresponding achievement score will be given, which will affect the exposure order of the streamer.
Baby Coins: According to the different levels earned by the rising star (please see the rewards sheet), the corresponding of baby coins will be given randomly.
Treasure gift of Rising Star: According to different levels earned by the rising star (please see the rewards sheet), will receive 888 pts of rising star treasure gift.
Lucky Bag of Rising Star: According to different levels earned by the rising star (please see the rewards sheet), will receive random gifts ranging between 1500 pts ~ 150000 pts.
Marquee of Rising Star: According to different levels earned by the rising star (please see the rewards sheet), will receive a marquee across the stream room to increase your exposure.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rules1: Streaming level will be evaluation at the end of each month, and the next month will be a new start. You can always get rewards and benefits with continuous efforts. The higher the streaming level is, the more rewards and benefits you will enjoy!
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rules2: Live stream rewards and ratings will be awarded at the moment of promotion and sent directly by the system to the stream roon. If the promoted streamer is not available, they will be awarded 10 minutes after the next stream. For example: if you can upgrade from Tier 0 to Tier 5 before the monthly summary, you can receive rewards corresponding to different stages at the moment of each achievement.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rules3:
All indicators will be updated in real time, and all indicators will be recalculated at 00:00 (GMT+8) at the beginning of the next month.
If the Streamer leveled up after streaming but failed to stream for more than 10 minutes before 00:00 (GMT+8) at the beginning of the next month, the streamer shall be deemed to have given up the right to receive the rewards of that month.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rules4: 17LIVE has the right to modify indicators and rewards.
streamer_growth_info_risingstar_rules5_n: A streamer can only get the reward of the same tier one time in a month.

If the Streamer leveled up after streaming but failed to stream for more than 10 minutes before 00:00 (GMT+8) at the beginning of the next month, the streamer shall be deemed to have given up the right to receive the rewards of that month.

streamer_loyalty_rule_detail1: Stream Level is assessed once a month. Every month is a new start, so keep up the good work to keep receiving rewards and benefits. The higher your level, the more rewards and benefits you'll get!
streamer_loyalty_rule_detail2: You'll receive the stream rewards and benefits in the following month. Use them before they expire, or they will be considered void.
streamer_loyalty_rule_detail3: The indices are updated at a fixed time each day, instead of real-time. Please refer the last updated time.
streamer_loyalty_rule_detail4:
High-level streamers enjoy additional benefits for keeping their tier: 
1. Gold Tier: Streamers begin with Emerald tier when they start streams next month.
2. Diamond Tier: Streamers begin with Emerald tier when they start streams next month.
3. Royal Black Tier: Streamers begin with Ruby tier when they start streams next month.
